hero.title: Advanced AI-Powered Online Exam Proctoring
hero.subtitle: Ensure academic integrity with our cutting-edge AI technology. Procto delivers seamless, secure, and scalable online proctoring solutions trusted by leading educational institutions worldwide.

features.title: AI-Powered Proctoring
features.description: Advanced AI technology monitors exam sessions to ensure academic integrity and prevent cheating.

features.title: Real-time Monitoring
features.description: Live video and audio monitoring with instant alerts for suspicious activities during exams.

features.title: Comprehensive Analytics
features.description: Detailed reports and analytics to track exam performance and identify potential issues.

features.title: Easy Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with existing LMS platforms and educational systems.

testimonials.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
testimonials.comment: Procto has revolutionized our online examination process. The AI detection is incredibly accurate.

testimonials.name: Mark Thompson
testimonials.comment: Easy to implement and use. Our faculty loves the comprehensive monitoring capabilities.

testimonials.name: Lisa Chen
testimonials.comment: Excellent platform for maintaining exam integrity in our remote learning environment.
